outline:
1. to put forth, mediate, muse, commune, speak, complain, ponder, sing
    1. (Qal)
      1. to complain
      2. to muse, meditate upon, study, ponder
      3. to talk, sing, speak
    2. (Polel) to meditate, consider, put forth thoughts
kjv_def: commune, complain, declare, meditate, muse, pray, speak, talk (with).
strongs_def: to ponder, i.e. (by implication) converse (with oneself, and hence, aloud) or (transitively) utter
